items.name: Redblade Banner
implicitMods: +2 to Level of Socketed Curse Gems
explicitMods: 83% increased Armour
+53 to maximum Life
20% increased Taunt Duration
+5% Chance to Block
50% increased Warcry Cooldown Recovery Rate
Warcries have infinite Power

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants life regeneration to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby Allies Regenerate 10 Life per second
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

properties.name: Attack, AoE, Movement, Travel, Physical, Melee

socketedItems.secDescrText: Charges at a targeted location or enemy, pushing away enemies in your path and repeatedly dealing off-hand damage in a small area in front of you. You deal damage in a larger area when you reach the target. The further you travel, the more damage you deal, and the greater your chance of stunning enemies. Cannot be supported by Multistrike.
explicitMods: 43 to 64 Base Off Hand Physical Damage
4 to 5 Added Physical Damage per 15 Armour or Evasion Rating on Shield
75% increased Stun Threshold reduction on enemies at Maximum charge distance
100% more Damage with Hits at Maximum Charge Distance
97% increased Movement Speed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Performs a warcry, taunting nearby enemies to attack the user and exerting subsequent attacks. Grants a buff which boosts critical strike chance and allows attacks to benefit from increases to spell damage.
explicitMods: Base duration is 5.90 seconds
38% increased Warcry Speed
Counts total Power of Enemies in Range
Buff grants 10% increased Critical Strike Chance per 5 power, up to a maximum of 30%
Buff makes Increases and Reductions to Spell Damage also apply to Attacks at 25% of their value per 5 power, up to a maximum of 150%
Exerts the next 5 Melee Attacks you perform
Exerted Attacks Trigger a Supported Spell with their first Melee Hit
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: Supported Skills deal 38% less Damage
Supported Spells are Triggered by Attacks Exerted by Battlemage's Cry
hybrid.secDescrText: Supports spell skills, causing them to be triggered. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills, channelling skills, and skills with a reservation cannot be triggered.
